thread.title: Convenient location with great breakfast
thread.title_full: Convenient location with great breakfast - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Katie M
title: Convenient location with great breakfast
text: The hotel is in a really good location for Euston station. It has very friendly staff and provided a great breakfast buffet with a wide selection of food and drink. Rooms are well supplied with everything you need.
